overview: The last important action by Muehl before he retired from the art world after a decade of painting and performance and focused on his commune as an alternative way of living. It marked the end of a very prolific phase of actions that followed the legendary Art and Revolution action by the Viennese Actionists in Vienna in 1968. As a result of this performance, Muehl and GÃ¼nter Brus were prosecuted and could no longer exhibit publicly in Austria.
title: Otto Muehl's Manopsychotic Ballet
